name: Giấy và Các Sản Phẩm Từ Giấy (Paper Products)

words.example: We should recycle paper to save trees.
I write my daily tasks in a small notebook.
Please open your history textbook to page fifty.
The teacher collected our exercise books for grading.
He prefers using loose-leaf paper in his binder.

words.vietnamese: bìa còng, bìa đựng tài liệu
words.example: Keep all your biology notes in this binder.
She organized the documents into a labeled file.
Put the signed contracts in the blue folder.
Can I borrow a blank sheet of paper?

words.vietnamese: giấy kẻ ô (giấy vẽ đồ thị)
words.example: You need graph paper to draw accurate charts in math class.
